snippet.title: Aeolis Tournament - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Aeolis Tournament is a 3D party action game where up to 8 players compete in various game modes based on a simple one-button mechanic. Characters use an air cannon to control the power of the wind and affect their surroundings.
​
Aeolis Tournament features physics-based gameplay, a tournament mode and local and online multiplayer play.

The game is currently under development in the Unity engine and is expected to be released on April 3rd 2020 on Steam (PC, MacOS, Linux) and Nintendo Switch. A port is also in the plans for the PlayStation 4 and XboxOne.

Learn more at aeolistournament.com
